TABLE.NAME: webinarru
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores the webinarru activity module instances.

FIELD.NAME: course
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the course this activity is part of.

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: The name of the activity module instance

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the instance was added to the course.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the instance was last modified.

FIELD.NAME: introformat
FIELD.COMMENT: The format of the intro field.

FIELD.NAME: purpose
FIELD.COMMENT: Purpose of an event created on mts-link.ru.

FIELD.NAME: webinar_date
FIELD.COMMENT: Date of the event on mts-link.ru.

FIELD.NAME: webinar_duration
FIELD.COMMENT: Duration of the event on mts-link.ru.

FIELD.NAME: webinar_link
FIELD.COMMENT: Link of the event on mts-link.ru.

FIELD.NAME: webinar_participants
FIELD.COMMENT: Link of the event on mts-link.ru.

FIELD.NAME: webinar_token
FIELD.COMMENT: Token for access to API on mts-link.ru.
